metadata.synopsis: Voicebark played by Wyll when he enters Blushing Mermaid: this place has historical importance to him, he smooched some ladies.IMPORTANT: The answer node may not play in case there are no fitting players to answer Wyll, so it should still make sense even without an answer.

0.speaker: Wyll
0.text: Ah - the Blushing Mermaid. I stole a few kisses or three here before my exile.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: |Only kisses? Are you sure about that?|

1.speaker: Wyll
1.text: Only kisses. But sweet as honey mead, every last one.
